plantRecorded.title: Do you remember the plant you met today?
plantRecorded.body: If you record it on Pio, you won't forget and can meet it again 🌱

flowerSpotted.title: Did you see any flowers on the street today?
flowerSpotted.body: Save it on Pio now and complete your own flower map 🌸

dailyRecord.title: How about recording a flower a day?

collectionAdd.title: Adding to your plant collection today?

bloomToday.title: Want to bloom a flower on Pio today?
bloomToday.body: Mark the plant you found with a marker! Don't forget to record 🌿

flowerName.title: Were you curious about the name of the flower you saw today?
flowerName.body: Pio will help you find it 🌺

plantDay.title: A day with plants, save it on Pio
plantDay.body: Your small records come together to create a beautiful map 🗺️

natureGift.title: Did you receive nature's gift again today?

markerMemory.title: One marker is one memory
markerMemory.body: Mark today's plant on the map! 📍

flowerPath.title: You're creating your own flower path
flowerPath.body: Pio will remember today's footprints too 🌸
